subject: CA53K92KBEI 1ZJ455510434683569
description_text:
Hello, I ordered through Amazon. Here is the tracking number
1ZJ455510434683569. However, I only received the pedals and not the rotors.
I would like a follow-up on the situation very quickly.

conversations.body_text: Hi Francis, Here is your tracking number for the motors is YT2536400702696767, the shipping carrier is YunExpress, you can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/
